Package xxl.core.io.raw

Contains classes and interfaces to access raw devices (disks) directly.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RawAccess
    Interface for raw file that contains sectors.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DecoratorRawAccess
    Decorates a RawAccess.
    LoggerRawAccess
    This class writes a logfile for all accesses of a RawDevice.
    NativeRawAccess
    This is the implementation of RawAccess via JNI an C methods which implement the unbuffered access to files and devices.
    PartitionRawAccess
    Allows user defined partitioning of a raw access.
    RAFRawAccess
    Implements RawAcces with java.io.RandomAccessFile (→RAF).
    RAMRawAccess
    Implements RawAccess via usage of main memory.
    RawAccessArrayFilesystemOperations
    This class provides a simple filesystem based on an array of RawAccesses.
    RawAccessRAF
    This class has all operations of RandomAccessFile, but uses a raw access below.
    RawAccessUtils
    Contains some useful classes for practical tasks.
    SeekMapperRawAccess
    If you have a big hard drive and only relatively small data, then possibly all data is on the same physical cylinder.
    StatisticsRawAccess
    Counts the calls to a (decorated) raw access and calculates a statistic of seeks.
    TesterRawAccess
    Tests a RawAccess by writing the data to a second control raw access.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    RawAccessException
    Error which will be thrown if a raw access operation fails.

Package xxl.core.io.raw Description

Contains classes and interfaces to access raw devices (disks) directly.
